desc: A report on the recent football match between team A and team B.

sttData.content: This document contains the report of the recent football match between team A and team B.
sttData.speaker: Narrator

sttData.content: Team A played against Team B on 15th March 2023 at the XYZ stadium. The document covers the highlights of the match, the performance of the players, and the statistics.
sttData.speaker: Narrator

textData: The document begins with an introduction of the teams and the venue of the match. It then moves on to describe the starting lineups and the pre-match analysis. Following that, it covers the first half of the match, detailing the key moments and the performance of each team. The second half is similarly described, with a focus on the turning points and the deciding factors. The document concludes with a summary of the match and the post-match reactions.
